text: I dont think Marcelino is here today so lets virtually stand up
Mostly done with the debian package build - just need to add the system service in there and we’re done
will get that working today and check in

*Merged in LED timeout firmware, LED timeouts are configurable
*Going to work on periodic rescan and connection of devices

* Reached the conclusion that taking photos of our bottles may be the best approach to have a consistent look. Will follow up with Marce later.
* Will try to implement localstorage settings
* Here for support if I can help in any way
<@U02618EV1>: spoke with Ewald about it - we've got the tools we need to do a shoot. Let's discuss.
Awesome and yes let’s chat whenever works best.
You thinking we should shoot all the bottles or just the ones we were missing?
Also pinged Shashi on the status of the new board order.

Probably all of them since once we set things up it would only take us a few minutes to shoot them. I’ve done something similar a couple of times so I’m happy to help a bit, do it all, or whatever makes more sense. Don’t want to add more work.
Order meaning run not the order of boards
Looks like the order will be placed on Wednesday.
Ignore my previous comment about the bad board, it was a function of my test setup
Is there a turnaround time on the new board order?
2-3 weeks is the previous estimate I had. Will confirm once the order is in.
